sentences: Ta on suutnud lahendada keerulise probleemi.
Me oleme suutnud saavutada head tulemusi.
Sa ei ole veel suutnud l√µpetada projekti.
context: The Estonian word 'suutnud' is the past participle form of the verb 'suda', which means 'to be able to' or 'to manage'. It indicates successful completion of an action after effort. This form is commonly used with negation (ei ole suutnud) when someone has not yet achieved something, or positively when they have successfully accomplished a task despite difficulties.
